description: Scaling test matrix: per-run agent profile counts and orchestrator commands (DryRun then Run).

runs.name: All-Low (10 agents)
runs.notes: DryRun should schedule all; real run should start all low-profile agents.

runs.name: Mixed Low/Medium (6L + 4M)
runs.notes: Exercise queueing when mediums compete for VRAM.

runs.name: Mixed Medium/High (2H + 6M + 2L)
runs.notes: Verify eviction policy when high-priority agents need VRAM.

runs.name: Turbo inclusion (Mixed with Turbo)
runs.notes: Turbo should be queued at low MaxVram; toggle to higher MaxVram to allow Turbo start.

runs.name: Progressive scale sweep
runs.notes: Run combinations to find stable thresholds.

executionNotes.dryRunFirst: Always run DryRun and inspect .continue/agents-epic.json before real runs.
executionNotes.logs: Save results under logs/stress/<run-id>-<timestamp>.log and mapping snapshots .continue/agents-epic.json.<run-id>.<timestamp>.json
executionNotes.healthMonitor: Run scripts/monitor-agents-epic.ps1 in parallel to exercise health probes and automatic restarts.
executionNotes.safety: Keep -DryRun by default. For Run, increase -StartupTimeout for high-model starts (30-60s).
